content: whether you have experience using double-pointed needles or not you can knit these fingerless mitts in this tutorial we learn how to get started on dpns how to knit in-the-round how to create a buttonhole thumb and how to bind-off in pattern the only skills you really need are confidence in both knitting and purling this free pattern includes links to a 4-part video tutorial to see the video tutorial visit my website http //verypink com/2013/05/01/easy-fingerless-mitts/
